Description: Bronze necked adze; inscribed on one side with an imitation cartouche of Userkaf.
Curator's comments: M. Odler, “Adzes in the Early Dynastic Period and the Old Kingdom”, in Karolina Rosińska-Balik, Agnieszka Ochał-Czarnowicz, Marcin Czarnowicz, Joanna Dębowska-Ludwin (eds), Copper and Trade in the South–Eastern Mediterranean. Trade routes of the Near East in Antiquity. BAR International Series 2753 (2015), fig. 8p
